titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Andorra
Andorra

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Several laws govern the preservation and use of the National Archives. There is no systematic declassification of documents, but researchers may appeal to the Archives Service to view records not generally available.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archive of Andorra: Edifici Prada Casadet, c. Prada Casadet, 8-12 - Andorra la Vella - Principality of Andorra.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write directly to the National Archives to inquire about access to diplomatic archives. The National Archives also hold materials from the Spanish and French ministries that are relevant to Andorra.
